name: FastCAM MTO Text File
summary: An MTO file is a text file created by FastCAM MTO, a program used by steel service centers, fabricators, and detailers to organize materials. It contains a list of items and materials and their properties, such as mass, surface area, and quantities. MTO files are saved in ASCII text format, which allows their stored information to be easily exchanged between users.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
